pr_title: Add more information to the PrivateTransactionReceiptResult

ignore new fields in tests

timeline.bodyText: NIT: This shouldn't be a TODO. It is just a note isn't it?
timeline.author: lucassaldanha
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -42,7 +42,16 @@ public void verify(final PrivacyNode node) {
         node.execute(transactions.getPrivateTransactionReceipt(transactionHash));
     assertThat(actualReceipt)
         .usingRecursiveComparison()
-        .ignoringFields("commitmentHash", "logs")
+        .ignoringFields(

+            "logs",

replies.bodyText: This really is a problem with the PrivateTransactionReceipt defined in web3j. Once this is updated these can be removed. That is why I put it in as a TODO ...
replies.author: pinges
